title: Why can't I surf the Internet during a call?
answer: When you're surfing the Internet over an LTE 4G network, if there is an incoming call, the phone will switch to a 2G or 3G network. If your phone switches to a 2G network, you can't surf the Internet during a call. If your phone switches to a 3G network, depending on your carrier's network, you can surf the Internet during a call.
